title: (x) Mobb Deep logo on album cover - Compacta {Mark S}
content:
Hello,  
could someone be kind to identify the logotype font of this record?  
That would be awesome! Couldn't figure this one out myself, ultra-condensed and allâ€¦

Bonus: I'd love to get the script font identified too!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hellonearth.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202082733/http:/typophile.com/files/hellonearth.png) | 156.68 KB |
author: yusf

comments.content: Nope, far more condensed than Impact.
Compacta is the font. Mark is 100% correct.

Thank you _so_ much, Mark!  
Typophile harness indispensable knowledge!
